initialData.css: .webcam-container { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; width: 100%; height: 100%; gap: 10px; } .webcam-slot { flex-grow: 1; background-color: #1f2937; border: 3px solid; border-color: var(--border-color, #4F46E5); border-radius: 8px; position: relative; overflow: hidden; box-sizing: border-box; } .nameplate { position: absolute; bottom: 10px; left: 10px; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7); color: var(--text-color, #ffffff); padding: 5px 10px; border-radius: 5px; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 18px; }
initialData.js: const root = document.documentElement; root.style.setProperty('--border-color', window.overlayProps.borderColor); root.style.setProperty('--text-color', window.overlayProps.textColor);
